export enum FIELD_TYPE {
    PAYMENT_HASH = 1,
    ROUTE = 3,
    EXPIRY = 6,
    FALLBACK_ADDRESS = 9,
    SHORT_DESC = 13,
    PAYEE_NODE = 19,
    HASH_DESC = 23,
    MIN_FINAL_CLTV_EXPIRY = 24,
}

export const EXPIRY_DEFAULT: number = 3600;
export const MIN_FINAL_CLTV_EXPIRY_DEFAULT: number = 9;
